ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND( RecordType.Name = 'UAE',OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'KYC Completed'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'KYC Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved'))),IF(ISPICKVAL(AML_Type__c, 'Individual'),OR( ISBLANK(Nationality__c ), ISBLANK(Country_Of_Birth__c ), ISBLANK(Country_Of_Residence__c ), ISBLANK(Screening_Shareholder__c ), ISBLANK(Employment_Type__c ), ISBLANK(Industry__c ), ISBLANK(Business_Location__c ), ISBLANK(Mode_of_Payment__c ), ISBLANK(Source_of_Fund_Wealth__c ) ),false),false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the AML type is "individual" and the status is either "approved," "KYC completed," or "KYC approved," it is mandatory to provide all individual parameters.
